news.title: Donald Trump calls Putin to arrange meeting between Zelensky and Russian leader to end war
Alarm as number of domestic abuse reports to gardaí soars by 45pc in just four years
news.summary: Domestic abuse calls to gardaí have soared by 45pc in the past four years, with the figure on track to increase again this year.

news.title: Gardaí feared Ian Bailey tried to  contaminate Sophie Toscan du Plantier murder scene with DNA traces
news.summary: As potentially dramatic DNA results are awaited from new vacuum tests on the rock and breeze block that were used to kill Sophie Toscan du Plantier, it can be revealed there was garda anxiety over Ian Bailey visiting the crime scene.

news.title: HSE boosts its ranks of middle managers and defends an increase in clerical staff
news.summary: HSE middle managers on salaries of up to €98,200 have seen the biggest boost in numbers in the last 10 years amid an ongoing rise in administrative workers.

news.title: Colm Keys: Three-year trend shows marked gains in inter-county discipline as football referees say new rules are key
news.summary: Discipline in inter-county GAA games has seen a marked year-on-year improvement for the last three years. Football Review Committee (FRC) got to work to perform an overhaul of the rules.

news.title: Mary Regan: Over before it begins? Momentum for Heather Humphreys leaves Seán Kelly facing uphill battle for Fine Gael nomination
news.summary: Heather Humphreys and Seán Kelly were contacting TDs, senators and MEPs yesterday before the opening of nominations for the Fine Gael presidential candidate.

news.title: ‘Striking and unexpected’ – the age group most likely to have out-of-control debts revealed
news.summary: The over-50s are the largest age group seeking personal insolvency solutions due to being over-indebted, new figures show.

news.title: Dónal Lynch: ‘Rock reunions are just siren calls for bandwagon jumpers and the only cool concert T-shirt is an old one’
news.summary: Walking through Dublin city centre on a hot summer Friday afternoon I see a line of around 200 people in Oasis-themed gear queuing to buy – not last-minute tickets, as I assumed – but yet more Oasis-themed gear.

news.title: Holly Baxter: Donald Trump’s meeting with Volodymyr Zelensky was even worse than their last Oval Office encounter
news.summary: After Friday’s red carpet love-in with Russian leader Vladimir Putin, US president Donald Trump sat down with Ukraine’s Volodymyr Zelensky yesterday at the Oval Office to talk peace and the world hoped it would go better than the last White House meeting between the US and Ukraine.

news.title: ‘It’s an Irish sisterhood’ – Rose of Tralee 2025 gets under way with close friendships formed
news.summary: With the viral American “sorority rush season” currently flooding social media feeds the world over, the Rose of Tralee is being viewed by competitors as a similar type of sisterhood.
